item.title: I-10 West - Exit 44
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 44 - AL-59/Loxley/Bay Minette.

item.title: AL-180 East at Dolphin Ave.
item.description: AL-180 East at Dolphin Ave. Turn left for AL-59.

item.title: End AL-59 South at AL-182
item.description: End AL-59 South at AL-182 in Gulf Shores.

item.title: End AL-59 South at AL-182
item.description: End AL-59 South at AL-182 in Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-180 West at AL-59
item.description: AL-180 West at AL-59 in Gulf Shores. Use AL-59 North for Foley; AL-59 south for Gulf Beaches. Continue west on AL-180 for Fort Morgan.

item.title: AL-180 West to AL-59 - Gulf Shores
item.description: AL-180 West to AL-59 in Gulf Shores

item.title: AL-59 South at US-98 - Foley
item.description: AL-59 South at US-98 in Foley. Use US-98 East for the Foley Beach Express. US-98 is the Coastal Connection Scenic Byway.

item.title: AL-59 South at Foley Beach Express
item.description: AL-59 South at Foley Beach Express to Orange Beach. Continue south on AL-59 for Foley.

item.title: AL-59 South at AL-104/CH-83 - Robertsdale
item.description: AL-59 South at AL-104/CH-83 in Robertsdale. Turn right for AL-104 West to Silverhill; left for CR-83.

item.title: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split
item.description: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split in Robertsdale. Turn left to continue east on US-90.

item.title: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split
item.description: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split in Robertsdale. Use US-90 East for Pensacola (Florida). Continue south on AL-59 for Robertsdale and Gulf Shores.

item.title: AL-59 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on AL-59 south. Distance to Loxley, Foley, Gulf Shores, and Orange Beach.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp at AL-59. Turn right on AL-59 North to I-65.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East - Exit 44 offramp. Turn right on AL-59 for Loxley, Gulf Shores, Orange Beach, and Gulf State Park.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 44
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 44 - AL-59/Loxley/Bay Minette.
